thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Lacey

author: Lacey
title: Lacey
text: This site was extremely simple and fast to use. Gave me the best prices and most options for flights that any other site I viewed! I like the ability to create a "fare alert" for price drop notifications! Booking was a breeze and only took a few minutes; I literally did it on my phone during a commercial break while watching TV! I received my confirmation immediately and have no worries or issues with my vacation! Would reccomended to anyone who wants the best price and doesn't want to waste time! ☺☺☺☺☺
